summary: A woman notices some very disturbing things about her new small town neighborhood. With the help of a police officer who also thinks that the town is hiding something, she attempts to unravel the sinister mystery.
cast: Ethan Embry|Eric Roberts|Courtney Gains|Alex Rocco|Kati Salowsky|Nick Apostolides|Jessica Sonneborn|Michael Malvesti|Josh Hammond|Dakota Shepard|Lee Simonds|Mathew Fisher|Sara Murphy|Michele Mortensen|Kaylee Signore|Abby Mann|Lauren Laperriere|Kate Bayersdorfer|Joshua Jacques|Ben Marshall|Mills Shenkman|David Graney|Greg Shea|Patty Moore|Walter Stone
title: The House Across the Street
